title: Seed data for tribes
description: Implement `app/seed/tribes.py` with async seed_tribes(session, users_dict) function. Create 3 tribes matching prototype: 1) Hospitality OS (Tom owner, Maya+James members, OPEN, mission: 'Building the operating system for independent hotels', open roles: Backend Engineer [Go, PostgreSQL], Growth Marketer [SEO, Partnerships]), 2) AI for Education (Sarah owner, Alex member, OPEN, mission: 'Making personalized learning accessible to every student', open roles: Product Designer [Figma, User Research]), 3) Creator Economy Tools (Elena owner, Marcus member, ACTIVE, mission: 'Empowering independent creators with better business tools'). Create TribeMember records with ACTIVE status for members. Create TribeOpenRole records with skills_needed JSONB. Return tribe dict.
acceptance_criteria:
- Exactly 3 tribes created
- TribeMember records: Tom(owner), Maya+James in Hospitality OS; Sarah(owner), Alex in AI for Education; Elena(owner), Marcus in Creator Economy
- Member status = ACTIVE
- TribeOpenRole records for open positions
- skills_needed populated as JSONB arrays
- Missions match spec exactly
- Returns tribe dict
